sentences.sentence: Most of the villagers took part in the Dragon Boat races at 9:00 a.m. on the morning of Jun 7.
sentences.translation: 6月7日上午9点，大多数村民参加了龙舟赛。

sentences.sentence: The embroidered designs were based on paper-cuts, the most well-known of them was from Bao Jun, a paper cutting master.
sentences.translation: 刺绣的设计以剪纸为基础，其中最为著名的是剪纸大师包钧的作品。

sentences.sentence: "Clothes are the basic part of culture so both the traditional clothes and modern clothes play the same role in culture," said Zhang Jun, a famous reporter.
sentences.translation: “服装是文化的基本组成部分，所以传统服装和现代服装在文化中都起着同样的作用。”著名记者张军说。
